code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{removeFromCart,clearCart}from'../redux/cartSlice';import'./Cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const cartItems=useSelector(state=>state.cart.items);const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleRemoveFromCart=itemId=>{dispatch(removeFromCart(itemId));};const handleClearCart=()=>{dispatch(clearCart());};const calculateTotal=()=>{return cartItems.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.price*item.quantity,0).toFixed(2);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Your Cart"}),cartItems.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Your cart is empty."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cartItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"cart-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",item.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Quantity: ",item.quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleRemoveFromCart(item.id),children:"Remove"})]})]},item.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-summary",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Total: $",calculateTotal()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleClearCart,children:"Clear Cart"})]})]})]});};export default Cart;
